author: djd
msg: DERBY-777 Remove use of java.io.InputStreamReader.getEncoding to get the
platform's default encoding. Creating this reader on System.in was causing
Now simply use the stream/reader constructors that do not take a encoding
argument and thus use the default. With this Derby does not need to know
the actual value of default encoding.

author: gnodet
msg: Fix problem with Saaj binding, where namespaces may disapear if put on the envelope.

author: carnold
msg: Bug 37864: Using BCEL head fixes earlier problem with NPE in compatibility report
